pkgmetadata.longdescription: ## ClickHouse ConnectA suite of Python packages for connecting Python to ClickHouse:* Pandas DataFrames* Numpy Arrays* PyArrow Tables* SQLAlchemy 1.3 and 1.4 (limited feature set)* Apache Superset 1.4+### Complete DocumentationThe documentation for ClickHouse Connect has moved to[ClickHouse Docs](https://clickhouse.com/docs/en/integrations/language-clients/python/intro) ### Installation```pip install clickhouse-connect```ClickHouse Connect requires Python 3.7 or higher.
